compilo

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • compilo.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the parsing and the semantic analysis. The LLVM code generator is also invoked during the parsing.

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String input)
        Launches the parser, then check the call list, the asks the LLVM generator to finalize the code, then to write it into a file.
        Parameters:
        input - Whole code as one single String.

      • checkCallList

        private void checkCallList()

        Checks if all the procedure are called.

        Checks if all the procedure called exists.

        The callList and performList are populated during the parsing.

        See Also:
        call(), label()

      • checkProgramId

        private void checkProgramId()
        Check if the program id the same at the beginning and the end of the code. If the program as not been initialized yet, it means we are at the beginning of the source code and we initialize it with the value of the current terminal - supposed to be an identifier. Else, it means we are at the end of the source, thus we check the program id is correct. In case of non correspondence, an error is raised.

      • escapeChar

        private static java.lang.String escapeChar(java.lang.String input)

        Escapes special characters by placing them inside rackets.

        This is to avoid confusion the string is used in regular expressions.

        Parameters:
        input - String containing the characters to escape.
        Returns:
        The escaped String.
